slides.text: Write down you knowledge about conditionals in a gist and bookmark it for later reference :-)

slides.question: What dos this statement mean - if (x < 20 || y < 10) { console.log('true') }
options: if x less than 20 and y less than 10, print 'true' to the console
if x less than 20 or y less than 10, print 'true' to the console
if x less than 20 if else y less than 10, print 'true' to the console
if x less than 20 while y less than 10, print 'true' to the console

slides.text: If you successfuly finished the challenge, click to complete the lesson.
